tool_description: Retrieve all the data from ArtStation including Projects, Artists, Jobs, Prints and Magazine Posts .
name: ArtStation
title: ArtStation

api_list.name: Magazine Posts
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://artstation.p.rapidapi.com/magazine/posts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "artstation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://artstation.p.rapidapi.com/jobs/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "artstation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Jobs
api_list.description: Get all the jobs currently in ArtStation

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description:
a search keyword if you are looking for a specific job 
dont include if you want all the jobs

api_list.name: Home

optional_parameters.name: filter_by
optional_parameters.description:
This parameter can be (latest , trending , community)
The Default value is \\\"trending\\\"
